bibl.title: New Literary Texts from Montserrat: (1) A Fragment of Johannes Chrysostomos' De Virginitate, Ch. 73 and (2) A New Papyrus of the Comparatio Menandri & Philistionis.
bibl.note: 1. P. Monts. Roca Inv. 995. A Fragment of Johannes Chrysostomos' De Virginitate, Ch. 73. Parchment. Provenance unknown, late 5th (or perhaps early 6th) century CE. - 2. Inv. 65. A New Papyrus of the Comparatio Menandri & Philistionis. Provenance unknown, between the late Vth and early VIth century. First transcript of the text on the verso [see now: Dieter HAGEDORN, Sofía TORALLAS TOVAR and Klaas A. WORP, P. Monts. Roca inv. 65verso Again, ZPE 160 (2007) pp. 181-182].
